prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (rugged handsome man:1.2), long emerald-green hair, mechanical sniper eyepiece covering one eye, intense revengeful gaze, sharp angular jawline, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (subtle stubble:1.2), (visible skin imperfections:1.1), individual hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching weathered leather jacket texture:1.2), (realistic glass lens refraction on eyepiece:1.3), film grain, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, smooth skin, airbrushed, low quality, friendly, (bright neon hair:1.3), messy eyepiece
